original_text: Adulterers wait until it is becoming dark. They think that no one will see them. They cover their faces so that no one will recognize them. Adulterers wait until it is becoming dark.
korean_text: 간음하는 자의 눈은 저물기를 바라며 아무 눈도 나를 보지 못하리라 하고 얼굴을 가리며

sentences.original_text: Adulterers wait until it is becoming dark
They think that no one will see them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무도 그들을 보지 못할 것이라고 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: so that no one will recognize them
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들을 알아보지 못하게 하기 위해서입니다

sentences.original_text: Adulterers wait until it is becoming dark
